screen_desc: The screenshot displays a pop-up offering a protection plan for an electronic product on Newegg. The plan is provided by Allstate and covers breakdowns, includes 24/7 online claims, offers a 5-day service guarantee, and covers 100% parts and labor with no deductibles. Users can select a 3-year or 4-year plan at different prices. The options to decline or add the protection plan to the cart are available at the bottom.
action_think: The user has successfully added the Logitech G PRO Wireless Gaming Mouse to the cart, and now the pop-up appears for a protection plan. To proceed, the next step is to dismiss the pop-up by selecting 'NO, THANKS' to continue with the checkout process.
action_plan: Dismiss the pop-up by selecting 'NO, THANKS'.
Select the checkout option to complete the process.
action_desc: Click on 'NO, THANKS' to dismiss the protection plan pop-up.
action_result:
